title: trying to reconnect
body:
Hey fellow summoners,

I still have problems with the new client, which is always trying to reconnect. i had the same probleme when the new client released but i came back on the legacy client and it fixed the problem, but now the legacy client is not available anymore and i still get this conection problem

Joining a game or simply pass the champ select is not quite possible because it always sort of lags out. This also occurs when im trying to view my match history. when I  joint the game succesfully , I dont have conexion issue.

I already tried out to put my IPv4/6 DNS-Server to the Google DNS on my Client and router, but that does not solve the problem.
It's still happening. 

Does anyone still experience the same problem? may you help me?

replies.body: You might need to change a few of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure the client is able to get a solid connection. Check out the steps in that guide, and let me know if you're able to stay in the game after updating those settings!

i tried evertything on this list and  the same bug is happening, im playing LoL since s2 and i never experimented that kind of lag until the alpha client come out... it'S make me feel very sad. the client keep disconecting  and trying to reconect and when im in queue de timer can go to 20min and i still dont find a game. when i try to get out of queue , the time  freeze and the only option i have to get out of the queue is to close the client and open it again..

I talked to support for 5 days and in the end they told me its my isp, i have no issues with anything else and it never happend till the new client. My isp is a bit different dont think they can do too much.
